Functions

00100_TrustletLoading
[Performance]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_SingleLoadingCacheNotCleared ()
 TestCase_GC00200_SingleLoadingCacheCleared ()
 TestCase_GC00300_RepeatedLoadingCacheNotCleared ()
 TestCase_GC00400_RepeatedLoadingCacheCleared ()
 TestCase_GC00500_RepeatedLoadingCacheNotClearedNoDeviceClose ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection

Generic preconditions (setup)
Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. There is not a certain generic prequisite for the tests to run.

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • close session to the Trusted Application
  • free allocated memory of WSM buffer
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_SingleLoadingCacheNotCleared (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05030000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
OPEN_TA_SESSION and mcNotify are performed quick enough
Test Steps:
Opens a session, sends a "ping" to the test trusted application and prints statistics.
Verification:
returns MC_DRV_OK.
Statistics are listed in the logs

none

TestCase_GC00500_RepeatedLoadingCacheNotClearedNoDeviceClose (  )

05030000000000000000000000000000

Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
OPEN_TA_SESSION and mcNotify are performed quick enough in average.

Opens and closes session 5000 times (without mcCloseDevice in between), and collects overall statistics.

returns MC_DRV_OK.
